input_email_body:
Subject: Available Billing Options for Netzteil and Kaspersky

Dear customer support, I am contacting you to seek information regarding the billing options for Netzteil and Kaspersky subscriptions You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Could you kindly share details about the different plans and their respective pricing? I am also interested in knowing if there are any discounts for long-term subscriptions or bundle deals My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Furthermore, I would like to be informed about the accepted payment methods and any additional fees associated with these subscriptions. I look forward to your prompt response.
